data.title: Samsung System LSI Tech Day 2023
data.meta_description: At Samsung S.LSI Tech Day 2023 on October 5, Samsung will showcase AI, 5G, and machine vision solutions, igniting the future of technology.
data.text:
1. Attendance of the Event, Access to the Website and Samsung Intellectual Property Rights

The Event and the Samsung System LSI Tech Day 2023 Website allow you to use the Contents (defined below) contained within it for your own use and benefit subject to the terms and conditions herein. Samsung shall have the right to modify, withdraw or deny your access to the Event or the Samsung System LSI Tech Day 2023 website at any time, including introducing charges for its use or other restrictions on access.

The information, documents, and other materials ("Content") presented at the Event or contained within the Samsung System LSI Tech Day 2023 website are provided "as is" and are given for general information and interest purposes only. Samsung updates the Content from time to time, but Samsung is not responsible for any errors, faults or inaccuracies. You should not therefore rely on the Content, and Samsung recommends that you take further advice or seek further guidance before taking any action based on it. You expressly agree and acknowledge that you use the Content at your sole risk and Samsung assumes no liability or responsibility for any user content or information provided by other users of the website.

The website and all the materials contained within it or made available by Samsung in connection with the Event, including without limitation, notes, records, reports, brochures or other documents and tangible items, belong to Samsung or Samsung’s licensor(s), and are protected as such by intellectual property rights (including, but not limited to, copyright, trademarks, patents, design rights, database rights, and rights in confidential information). The materials include, but are not limited to, the design, layout, logos, brands, look, appearance and graphics of the website, plus Content such as software, documents and other materials which appear on it. You may not copy, redistribute, republish or otherwise make the materials on the website available to anyone else for a commercial purpose without prior consent of Samsung in writing.

You may only share materials obtained at the Event or printed or downloaded from the website for your own personal, non-commercial use, provided that:

no materials are modified in any way

no graphics are used separately from accompanying text

copyright and trademark notices appear in all copies, and you acknowledge this website as the source of the materials and

the people to whom you provide these materials are made aware of these restrictions.

Notwithstanding the foregoing, specific license terms for materials on the website may allow broader rights of use, subject to such terms.

Nothing in these terms and conditions grants any license to use any Samsung brand. However, you may be entitled to use the logo of Samsung System LSI Tech Day 2023 and some designed elements in accordance with our guidance that may be updated from time to time.

To the fullest extent permitted by law, we expressly exclude all representations, conditions, warranties or other terms which apply to such Content/information, including any implied warranties of satisfactory quality, merchantability, fitness for a particular or any purpose, and non-infringement which might otherwise apply but for this clause.

If, in a relevant jurisdiction, these limitations and exclusions are not permitted, then our liability shall be limited and excluded to the fullest extent permitted by law.

2. Safety and Security

Your safety and security is important to us. You acknowledge that you will follow all instructions and/guidelines issued by Samsung at all times during the Event. We also reserve the right to ask you to leave the Event if your behavior causes us concern for the safety or security of Event attendees.

Samsung reserves the right, including without prior notice, to limit the number of Event attendees and participants, to cancel or terminate any Event registration, to bar any person from attending all or any part of the Event, and to refuse to provide any person with access to Event materials.

3. Samsung Goods and Services

Samsung may display the availability of some goods and/or services at the Event or on this website. Some of these goods and/or services may only be available in certain jurisdictions and Samsung therefore reserves the right to choose where such goods and/or services are supplied. By informing the availability of any goods and/or services, Samsung does not warrant that such goods and/or services will be available in your jurisdiction and you should check with your local Samsung contact for further information. Where Samsung does supply goods and/or services, whether through this website or other means, additional terms and conditions may apply.

4. Assumption of Risk; Liability

Your attendance of or participation in the Event or any related activities is completely voluntary. Samsung does not guarantee your admission to all or any part of the Event (including any session, keynote or other activity). To the maximum extent permitted under applicable law, you accept and assume all risks of any and all personal injury or damage to your personal property that you may face while attending the Event, and hereby waive any claims you may have against Samsung and its affiliates, Event sponsors or vendors relating to such risks.

Samsung does not guarantee that the Samsung System LSI Tech Day 2023 website or any product and/or services provided at the Event or through the Samsung System LSI Tech Day 2023 website:

will be compatible with all or any hardware and software which you may use

will be available all the time or at any specific time.

By attending the Event or using the Samsung System LSI Tech Day 2023 Website, you agree to indemnify Samsung, and other companies and corporations in the Samsung group, against any costs, damage, claims, liabilities and expenses incurred as a result of your breach of these Terms and Conditions, the Privacy Policy, and/or any other applicable terms.

SAMSUNG AND ITS AFFILIATES WILL NOT BE LIABLE TO YOU UNDER ANY CAUSE OF ACTION OR THEORY OF LIABILITY, EVEN IF YOU HAVE BEEN ADVISED OF THE POSSIBILITY OF SUCH DAMAGES, FOR INDIRECT, INCIDENTAL, SPECIAL, CONSEQUENTIAL, OR EXEMPLARY DAMAGES, INCLUDING BUT NOT LIMITED TO LOST PROFITS, LOST OPPORTUNITIES, OR LOSS OF GOODWILL. SAMSUNG AND ITS AFFILIATES’ AGGREGATE LIABILITY UNDER THESE TERMS WILL NOT EXCEED USD $100. THE LIMITATIONS IN THIS SECTION APPLY ONLY TO THE MAXIMUM EXTENT PERMITTED BY APPLICABLE LAW.

5. Linking

Samsung may link to other websites which are not within its control. When possible, Samsung will note that you are leaving the Samsung System LSI Tech Day 2023 website. Samsung is not responsible for these other sites in any way, and does not endorse them. It is your responsibility to check the terms and conditions and privacy policy on any other site which you visit.

You may not link to https://semiconductor.samsung.com/events/techday-systemlsi-2023/ from another site without our prior consent in writing. Any consent would be subject to complying with the following guidelines:

links must be to the home page https://semiconductor.samsung.com/events/techday-systemlsi-2023/

you may not create a frame or any other border around

https://semiconductor.samsung.com/events/techday-systemlsi-2023/

the site from which you wish to link must comply with all relevant laws and regulations and must not contain content which may be considered to be distasteful or offensive, which shall be determined at Samsung's sole discretion

you must not imply that Samsung endorses, or is associated with, any other site, product or service

6. Fees

Attendance of the Event and the use of Samsung System LSI Tech Day 2023 website services are free of charge. Samsung reserves the right to charge for the Event or Samsung System LSI Tech Day 2023 website services and to change its fees, at its discretion. Samsung may from time to time launch other services which may be subject to a separate charge and terms.

7. Contracting Online

Neither your attendance of the Event nor anything on the Samsung System LSI Tech Day 2023 website is intended to be, nor should be construed as, an offer or acceptance to enter into a contractual relationship with you or anyone else, except for these terms and conditions, which govern the relationship between us in relation to your attendance of the Event and/or use of the Samsung System LSI Tech Day 2023 website and the services made available through it (plus any additional terms we impose in relation to specific products and/or services offered at the Event or on the website).

If you enter into a contract with a third party who is named or referred to at the Event or on the Samsung System LSI Tech Day 2023 website, Samsung takes no responsibility with respect to such action and it is your responsibility to ensure that you are comfortable with the terms of that contract, and to take legal advice if necessary.

8. Personal Release

Samsung (and/or others on behalf of Samsung) may be photographing, recording (both audio and video), webcasting or otherwise transmitting during any or all of the Event (including at the Event venue during an Event session, breakout, keynote or other activity). Your image, likeness, voice, statements and other identifying characteristics (each, an “Image”) may be captured in photographs, recordings (both audio and video), webcasts or other transmissions of the Event (each, a “Recording”).

You hereby grant to Samsung a worldwide, royalty-free, fully paid-up, non-exclusive, perpetual, irrevocable, transferable and fully sublicensable (through multiple tiers) license, without additional consideration to you or any third party, to reproduce, distribute, perform and display Recordings (including your Images therein), in whole or in part, in any format or media now known or hereafter developed, and for any purpose.

Samsung exclusively owns all right, title and interest (including intellectual property rights) in and to the Recordings, all modifications and derivatives of Recordings, and all proceeds derived therefrom. Samsung has no obligation to share any such proceeds with you.

In connection with Samsung’s use or other exploitation of Recordings (including your Images), you hereby irrevocably waive and release any and all claims with respect to intellectual property, rights of publicity, rights of privacy, and any other claims or damages with respect to such use or other exploitation. You affirm that you are of legal age and have read the foregoing release and fully understand its contents.

9. Changes to Event

The Event is subject to change at any time. Samsung does not guarantee the attendance of any third party (including any exhibitor or speaker), or that any scheduled session, keynote or other activity will take place.

Samsung reserves the right, including without prior notice, to cancel or postpone the Event or make any change to an Event program at any time for any reason (including modification of the schedule or content of, or cancellation of, any session, keynote or other activity). Samsung is not responsible for, and no reimbursement will be issued in the event of, any change to the Event (including modification of the overall Event program, or the schedule or content of, or cancellation of, any session, keynote or other activity).

10. Governing Law and Jurisdiction

The formation, existence, construction, performance, validity and all aspects whatsoever of these terms and conditions, or of any individual one of these terms and conditions, will be governed by the laws of the Republic of Korea. The Seoul Central District Court will have exclusive jurisdiction to settle any disputes which may arise out of, or in connection with, these terms and conditions, your attendance of the Event or the use of the Samsung System LSI Tech Day 2023 website.

11. Age Limit

I acknowledge that I am above the age of majority of the country that the Event is being held and agree to all these terms and conditions prior to attending the Event (either in-person or online).

Everyone is welcome to visit the Samsung System LSI Tech Day 2023 website. However, if you want to participate on certain sections of the website or in certain activities available on the website (for example, join a club or group or enter a contest), you must register to the website. In order to register, you must be at least 18 years old or receive your parents and/or guardians written consent.
